claims.claim: Achieved 3-year cost optimization goals in just 18 months
claims.quote: In just 18 months, Social Security Scotland achieved the cost optimization goals originally set for a three-year period.

claims.claim: 30.4% reduction in cloud costs within first year
claims.quote: Within the first year alone, the organization had a 30.4% reduction in cloud costs.

claims.claim: 78% of savings driven by usage optimization
claims.quote: As a result, the agency was able to save a huge amount, with 78% of those savings driven by usage optimization.

claims.claim: Enhanced digital service delivery and operational resilience
claims.quote: The result was a smarter, more transparent cloud strategy that not only optimized spend but also enhanced digital service delivery and operational resilience.

claims.claim: Became a model for delivering taxpayer value in UK public sector
claims.quote: Social Security Scotland is now at the forefront of FinOps capability in the UK public sector and a model for other organizations to deliver the best possible value for taxpayers.

claims.claim: Successfully processed £3 million in payments over 42 consecutive weeks
claims.quote: Since MVS launch in June 2022, the payments service has processed 1,641 payments over 42 consecutive weeks (batches) to the value of £3 million and deployed 11 releases.

claims.claim: Digital transformation drives efficiencies across public sector
claims.quote: The use of common platforms, Payments and Identity platforms, and investment in Cloud technology will drive efficiencies across the public sector.
